abstract: But teams outside of American banks still face considerable fund-raising obstacles in trying to follow HSBC’s lead.
snippet: But teams outside of American banks still face considerable fund-raising obstacles in trying to follow HSBC’s lead.
lead_paragraph: Don’t take the spinoff of HSBC’s Asian private equity unit as a green light for everyone to go solo.

headline.main: HSBC Spins Off Asian Private Equity Business
